DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , randomize , rater-blinded , 5-arm , parallel-group trial test 4 dos plovamer acetate active comparator Copaxone subject Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis ( RRMS ) . The trial conduct outpatient basis minimum treatment duration 40 week .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability Plovamer Acetate ( Pathway 1 )
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 18 60 year Subject able learn selfadminister subcutaneous injection ( caregiver may train inject subject ) Subjects must current diagnosis Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis ( RRMS ) ( accord 2010 McDonald MS diagnostic criterion ) Other protocol define inclusion criterion could apply Any multiple sclerosis categorize primary progressive , secondary progressive progressive relapse Allergy mannitol , plovamer acetate , Copaxone ( glatiramer acetate ) , Gd contrast MRI Any requirement continuous systemic glucocorticoid administration trial period .
